name: LEADING EDGE INTERNATIONAL AVIATION ACADEMY INC. (LEIAAI)
about: Leading Edge International Aviation Academy, Inc. (LEIAAI) is a premier aviation school established in 2007 by five Philippine Air Force Flying School alumni. We provide quality and extensive training programs for aspiring pilots and aircraft technicians, adhering to the highest standards of technical expertise, professionalism, and global safety standards. Located at Poro Point, San Fernando, La Union, Philippines, we offer affordable flight training using the Cessna 172, with minimal air traffic ensuring longer flying time. Our fleet is maintained by a CAAP-approved organization, and our instructors are experienced professionals from the Philippine Air Force. We are committed to producing world-class pilots and contributing to the growth of the aviation industry and the country's economy. Our mission is to deliver top-quality aviation services, focusing on education, safety, and social responsibility.
